column4: I've got a gutsy machine that refuses to upgrade to hardy, complaining over gnome-screensaver or some such garbage. does anyone know how to brute force my way through this?
you should upgrade to the latest gutsy first...
what i did was sudo apt-get update, sudo apt-get upgrade, then changed gutsy to hardy in my sources.list and did sudo aptitude dist-upgrade
oh, that method is unsupported, why dont you use the supported method?  update-manager?
